post.author: 김중수
post.content:
I got this mail from my ex-director. If you have any experience of Java with C#, please send me your CV ASAP with your hourly rate. I will check your resume and forward to the director. He is not a job agent, he is the director of the company that I worked for.
Thanks Edward
//=======================================================// Hello Eddy, We have a possible mandate in the Toronto Area in Java and C# between October 18 to Christmass working at the client site.If you are available, please let me know and send me your CV with your hourly rate.
Best regards, Michel //========================================================//
post.title: Java/C# Contract position in Toronto Area
